name: modex_modexensaves_costs
title: MODEX - MODEX-EnSAVes - Costs data
description: [Multiple Topics]: Wholesale electricity prices; Prices for fuels (oil, lignite, coal, gas, uranium, biomass, bioliquid, biogas); Prices for CO2; Specific investment of power plants for different generation technologies, i.e. gas, lignite, hard coal, oil and nuclear; Power plant load change cost (dependent on depreciation and fuel factor) for different generation technologies, i.e. gas, lignite, hard coal, oil and nuclear; Variable and fixed operation and maintenance costs of power plants for different generation technologies, i.e. gas, lignite, hard coal, oil and nuclear; Power plant start-up cost (dependent on depreciation and fuel factor) for different generation technologies, i.e. gas, lignite, hard coal, oil and nuclear

_comment.dates: Dates and time must follow the ISO8601 including time zone (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss±hh)
_comment.units: Use a space between numbers and units (100 m)
_comment.languages: Languages must follow the IETF (BCP47) format (en-GB, en-US, de-DE)
_comment.licenses: License name must follow the SPDX License List (https://spdx.org/licenses/)
